titles.title: A bill for the relief of H.H. Barter, doing business as Barter Enterprises.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.
Reported to House by House Committee on The Judiciary. Report No: 100-1015.
Called up by House on Call of Private Calendar.
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

bill.summary: 6/7/1988--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to a named individual in full satisfaction of any claim against the United States arising out of the damage of a bulldozer caused by enrollees of the Job Corps.
